roleset.name: have as a primary subject in school

example.name: one example suffices
example.text: He says he has quit the business and is back in school, [*] majoring in psychology with aspirations to go into industrial psychology.)
example.arg: with aspirations to go into industrial psychology.)

roleset.note: MAJOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'major' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from major.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: great in scope, extent, importance, etc

example.name: arg1
example.text: ... your credit card bill is going [*]to be major after the game , ...
